subject: College Athletics
Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Squandering a 20-point lead at the break after holding No. 8 Tennessee to its lowest point total during any half in its history, No. 15 Rutgers fell apart in the final 20 minutes of the game.
snippet: Squandering a 20-point lead at the break after holding No. 8 Tennessee to its lowest point total during any half in its history, No. 15 Rutgers fell apart in the final 20 minutes of the game.
